bioghist.p: James Pillans was appointed as Professor of Humanity at Edinburgh University in November 1644, in succession to Robert Young. Pillans was appointed Professor of Philosophy in 1652. Professor (or Regent) James Pillans resigned in April 1681.

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of: dictates, 1662; dictates, 1672-1673; and, dictates on philosophy, 1672-1673

acqinfo.p: Blackadder dictates, acquired Sotheby December 1977, Accession no. E77.41.
